verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%>
Dan, <S%H1835><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H6147>Er,<s%> and <S%H209>Onan,<s%> and <S%H7956>Shelah:<s%> which <S%H7969>three<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him of the <S%H4480>daughter<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H7770>Shua<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanitess.<s%> And <S%H6147>Er,<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he <S%H4191>slew<s%> him.

And <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> his daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H6557>Pharez<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H2568>five.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Pharez;<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah;<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> and <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3633>Calcol,<s%> and <S%H1873>Dara:<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> of them in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi;<s%> <S%H5917>Achar,<s%> the <S%H5916>troubler<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> in the thing <S%H2764>accursed.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan;<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H853>him;<s%> <S%H3396>Jerahmeel,<s%> and <S%H7410>Ram,<s%> and <S%H3621>Chelubai.<s%>

And <S%H7410>Ram<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5992>Amminadab;<s%> and <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>
And <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8007>Salma,<s%> and <S%H8007>Salma<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1162>Boaz,<s%>
And <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%>

And <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H8092>Shimma<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H7288>Raddai<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>
Ozem <S%H684><s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> the seventh: <S%H7637><s%>

Whose <S%H269>sisters<s%> were <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> and <S%H26>Abigail.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah;<s%> <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H6214>Asahel,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>
And <S%H26>Abigail<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6021>Amasa:<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> was <S%H3500>Jether<s%> the <S%H3459>Ishmaelite.<s%>

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> children <S%H854>of<s%> <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H854>of<s%> <S%H3408>Jerioth:<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H3475>Jesher,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H715>Ardon.<s%>
And when <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> unto <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> which <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H2354>Hur.<s%>
And <S%H2354>Hur<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H221>Uri,<s%> and <S%H221>Uri<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> whom <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3947>married<s%> when <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H7687>Segub.<s%>

And <S%H7687>Segub<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> who <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1650>Geshur,<s%> and <S%H758>Aram,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them, <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H7079>Kenath,<s%> and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> thereof, even <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> belonged to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And after <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> was <S%H4194>dead<s%> in <S%H3613>Caleb-ephratah,<s%> then <S%H29>Abiah<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H806>Ashur<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> <S%H1961>were,<s%> <S%H7410>Ram<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H946>Bunah,<s%> and <S%H767>Oren,<s%> and <S%H684>Ozem,<s%> and <S%H281>Ahijah.<s%>
Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> also <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5851>Atarah;<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H208>Onam.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> <S%H1961>were,<s%> <S%H4619>Maaz,<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> and <S%H6134>Eker.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H208>Onam<s%> <S%H1961>were,<s%> <S%H8060>Shammai,<s%> and <S%H3047>Jada.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai;<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H51>Abishur.<s%>
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H51>Abishur<s%> was <S%H32>Abihail,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H257>Ahban,<s%> and <S%H4140>Molid.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5070>Nadab;<s%> <S%H5540>Seled,<s%> and <S%H649>Appaim:<s%> but <S%H5540>Seled<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H649>Appaim;<s%> <S%H3469>Ishi.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi;<s%> <S%H8348>Sheshan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8348>Sheshan;<s%> <S%H304>Ahlai.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3047>Jada<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai;<s%> <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> and <S%H3126>Jonathan:<s%> and <S%H3500>Jether<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3126>Jonathan;<s%> <S%H6431>Peleth,<s%> and <S%H2117>Zaza.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel.<s%>

Now <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> had a <S%H5650>servant,<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3398>Jarha.<s%>

And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H3398>Jarha<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> to <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H6262>Attai.<s%>
And <S%H6262>Attai<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2066>Zabad,<s%>
And <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H654>Ephlal,<s%> and <S%H654>Ephlal<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5744>Obed,<s%>
And <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>
And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2503>Helez,<s%> and <S%H2503>Helez<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H501>Eleasah,<s%>
And <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5581>Sisamai,<s%> and <S%H5581>Sisamai<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%>
And <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3359>Jekamiah,<s%> and <S%H3359>Jekamiah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H476>Elishama.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> were, <S%H4337>Mesha<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H8599>Tappuah,<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> and <S%H8087>Shema.<s%>
And <S%H8087>Shema<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7357>Raham,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3421>Jorkoam:<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8060>Shammai.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> was <S%H4584>Maon:<s%> and <S%H4584>Maon<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1049>Beth-zur.<s%>

And <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb's<s%> <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> and <S%H4162>Moza,<s%> and <S%H1495>Gazez:<s%> and <S%H2771>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1495>Gazez.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3056>Jahdai;<s%> <S%H7276>Regem,<s%> and <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> and <S%H1529>Geshan,<s%> and <S%H6404>Pelet,<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> and <S%H8174>Shaaph.<s%>
Maachah, <S%H4601><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb's<s%> <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H7669>Sheber,<s%> and <S%H8647>Tirhanah.<s%>

She <S%H3205>bore<s%> also <S%H8174>Shaaph<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4089>Madmannah,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7724>Sheva<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4343>Machbenah,<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1388>Gibea:<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> was <S%H5915>Achsah.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H672>Ephratah;<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%>
Salma <S%H8007><s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%H2780>Hareph<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1013>Beth-gader.<s%>
And <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> <S%H7204>Haroeh,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4506>Manahethites.<s%>

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim;<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrites,<s%> and the <S%H6336>Puhites,<s%> and the <S%H8126>Shumathites,<s%> and the <S%H4954>Mishraites;<s%> of <S%H4480>them<s%> <S%H428><s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H6882>Zareathites,<s%> and the <S%H848>Eshtaulites.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8007>Salma;<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> and the <S%H5200>Netophathites,<s%> Ataroth the house of <S%H5854>Joab,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2680>Manahethites,<s%> the <S%H6882>Zorites.<s%>

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H5608>scribes<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3258>Jabez;<s%> the <S%H8654>Tirathites,<s%> the <S%H8101>Shimeathites,<s%> and <S%H7756>Suchathites.<s%> <S%H1992>These<s%> are the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> of <S%H4480>Hemath,<s%> <S%H2575><s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab.<s%>
